de.slothsoft.charts.swing

Class MoveLineChartByMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.slothsoft.charts.swing.MoveLineChartByMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener

    public class MoveLineChartByMouseListener
extends Object
implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
    A MouseListener, MouseMotionListener and MouseWheelListener to move the diagram with the mouse. It's advised to add this listener by using the hookToControl(Component, LineChart) method.
    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz

      Constructors

      Constructor.

      static MoveLineChartByMouseListener hookToControl(Component control, LineChart chart)
      Creates a new MoveLineChartByMouseListener, hooks it to a control (not necessary a ChartControl, but that's probably a good idea) and returns the brand new instance.

      • hookToControl

        public static MoveLineChartByMouseListener hookToControl(Component control,
                                                         LineChart chart)
        Creates a new MoveLineChartByMouseListener, hooks it to a control (not necessary a ChartControl, but that's probably a good idea) and returns the brand new instance.
        Parameters:
        control - the control, probably a ChartControl
        chart - the displayed chart
        Returns:
        the brand new listener
